Synopsis:
After many years of having the played the genre for melodrama and operatic effect, spaghetti Western filmmakers finally took the plunge in 1971 and made and out-and-out comedy with THEY CALL ME TRINITY (LO CHIAMAVANO TRINITY). Trinity is a lazy, shiftless gunfighter who would have been killed long ago if not for his blinding fast draw.
